ComicInfo.Summary:
Actor turned AIM agent George Prufrock has been infected by the Lifeform virus and begs the mysterious Mercy to kill him but, instead, she does him one better by introducing him to the Hulk.
She-Hulk is tricked into helping a long lived pirate turned entertainment lawyer recover his lost treasure at the bottom of the sea.
Samson has a nightmare about the Hulk that he cannot wake up from.
ComicInfo.Tags: Blonde Phantom,Hulk,Juggernaut,Daredevil,Hell's Kitchen,Thing,Mercy,Doc Samson,Mad Man,A.I.M.,Namor,Wolverine,Ben Urich,Lifeform,Abomination,She-Hulk,United States Army,Rhino,Absorbing Man,Thor,New York City
ComicInfo.Title: Quality of Mercy [Lifeform Part 3]; You Can't Always Get What You Want; The Hulk's 10 Best Brawls; The Nightmare Never Ends!
